resources.string:
Systems Analyst specialized in Project Management.
My last development experiences were focused on developing mobile applications (iPhone | iPad) in the company Tap4 mobile.

I've previously worked with ERP systems in Gradiente.

Embedded software for TV sets in Samsung.

Development of drivers for ARM devices running Windows CE in Instituto inTera.

Partner in Tap4 where I served as Director of Technology, created mobile solutions focused on Android and iOS and I developed and architect applications for those platforms.
